question: How much can I borrow for a mortgage if I have an annual income of $80,000 and a monthly debt of $500?
true_answer: Based on your income and monthly debt, you can borrow approximately $320,000.

steps.content: How much can I borrow for a mortgage if I have an annual income of $80,000 and a monthly debt of $500?
Plan: 1) Calculate DTI ratio with home_loan_agent. 2) Retrieve knowledge on borrowing limits. 3) Use calculator for maximum borrowing amount. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Provide final answer.
Calculating debt-to-income ratio with income of $80,000 and monthly debt of $500.
Retrieving knowledge on typical borrowing limits based on DTI.
Typically, lenders allow a borrowing limit up to 4x annual income if DTI is below 36%.
Calculating maximum borrowing amount based on income and DTI.
What interest rates should I expect?
Retrieving current average mortgage interest rates.
Current average mortgage interest rates range from 3% to 5% based on credit score.
All calculations and knowledge retrieval verified.
Based on your income and monthly debt, you can borrow approximately $320,000. Current interest rates range from 3% to 5%.
